original_text: ‘You must say to the Levites, “You will receive from the Israelites the tithe that I have given to you from them. I have not given any land to you. I have given the tithes to you instead. When you receive those tithes, you must offer one tenth of it to the Lord. That will be a tithe of the tithe.
korean_text: 너는 레위인에게 말하여 그에게 이르라 내가 이스라엘 자손에게 받아 너희에게 기업으로 준 십일조를 너희가 그들에게서 받을 때에 그 십일조의 십일조를 거제로 여호와께 드릴 것이라

sentences.original_text: You must say to the Levites,
You will receive from the Israelites the tithe
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 이스라엘 사람들에게서 십일조를 받을 것이다

sentences.original_text: that I have given to you from them.
I have not given any land to you.
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너에게 어떤 땅도 주지 않았다.

sentences.original_text: I have given the tithes to you instead.
you must offer one tenth of it to the Lord.
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 그것의 십분의 일을 주께 바쳐야 한다.

sentences.original_text: That will be a tithe of the tithe.
